The claim of the FBI raid on the White H: indicating the social network's efforts to combat fake news.
The headline from the New Century Times: a left-leaning website, exaggerated the event by referring to it as an "FBI raid," which conjured up an image of armed personnel storming the White House.
The story originated from Western Journa: a source of conservative and libertarian news, but it was later traced back to an article in Politico, a reputable news source.
The six staffers were actually escorted: specifically related to their SF86 application, which includes questions about employment history, criminal record, mental health, and illicit drug use.
